mapper.select: SELECT mo.mat_or_code, mo.mat_or_name, mo.mat_code, b.business_code, b.business_name, mo.mat_or_count, mo.mat_or_date, moi.mat_or_due_date, mo.mat_or_manager FROM mat_order mo JOIN business b ON mo.business_code = b.business_code JOIN mat_order_info moi ON mo.mat_or_code = moi.mat_or_code

SELECT mo.mat_or_code, mo.mat_or_name, mo.mat_code, m.mat_name, b.business_code, b.business_name, mo.mat_or_count, mo.mat_or_date, moi.mat_or_due_date, mo.mat_or_manager, mo.mat_or_state FROM mat_order mo LEFT JOIN business b ON mo.business_code = b.business_code LEFT JOIN mat_order_info moi ON mo.mat_or_code = moi.mat_or_code JOIN material m ON mo.mat_code=m.mat_code ORDER BY mat_or_code DESC

SELECT b.business_code, b.business_name, m.mat_code, m.mat_name FROM business b JOIN mat_order mo ON b.business_code = mo.business_code JOIN material m ON mo.mat_code = m.mat_code WHERE m.mat_code = #{matCode} GROUP BY b.business_code, b.business_name, m.mat_code, m.mat_name
SELECT * FROM material ORDER BY mat_code DESC
SELECT m.mat_code, m.mat_name, m.mat_safe_stock, m.mat_unit, m.mat_standard, ml.mat_count FROM material m JOIN mat_lot ml ON m.mat_code = ml.mat_code

SELECT MO.mat_out_code, MO.business_code, B.business_name, ML.mat_manager, M.mat_name, ML.mat_lot_code, ML.mat_count, MO.mat_out_count, MO.mat_out_date FROM mat_output MO JOIN mat_lot ML ON MO.mat_lot_code=ML.mat_lot_code JOIN business B ON MO.business_code = B.business_code JOIN material M ON ML.mat_code=M.mat_code

SELECT l.mat_code, m.mat_name, l.mat_lot_code, l.mat_ins_code, i.mat_ins_count, i.mat_ins_good AS mat_ins_good_count, l.mat_input_date, l.mat_manager FROM mat_lot l JOIN mat_inspection i ON l.mat_ins_code = i.mat_ins_code JOIN material m ON l.mat_code = m.mat_code

SELECT M.mat_ins_code, M.mat_ins_good, M.mat_ins_bad, M.mat_ins_date, BM.bad_mat_content, MO.mat_or_code, MO.mat_or_count, MA.mat_name, MA.mat_unit, MA.mat_standard, BU.business_name FROM mat_inspection M LEFT JOIN bad_material BM ON M.mat_ins_code = BM.bad_mat_code LEFT JOIN mat_order MO ON M.mat_or_code = MO.mat_or_code LEFT JOIN material MA ON MO.mat_code = MA.mat_code LEFT JOIN business BU ON MO.business_code = BU.business_code

SELECT MR.mat_re_code, B.business_name, M.mat_code, M.mat_name, ML.mat_lot_code, ML.mat_count, MR.mat_re_count, MR.mat_re_content, MR.mat_re_start_date, MR.mat_re_manager, MR.mat_re_state FROM mat_return MR JOIN business B ON MR.business_code = B.business_code JOIN mat_lot ML ON MR.mat_lot_code = ML.mat_lot_code JOIN material M ON ML.mat_code = M.mat_code
